feed.title: Project tracker
feed.subtitle: This is a demo website to demonstrate how to build an interactive leaflet map which is generated from a CSV file

entry.title: Initial website development - proof of concept

link.title: Initial website development - proof of concept

entry.content: I added two example projects with limited metadata to the project CSV and ensured that they render on the map.
entry.summary: I added two example projects with limited metadata to the project CSV and ensured that they render on the map.
